issues.environment: particularly in terms of transport and environmental crisis

leaflet.personalStatement: It has been an honour to be your MP for the last 23 years and I've loved (almost!) every minute. I'm sad to be stepping down, but do so with gratitude to the many people I have worked with over the years, and I'm proud to leave Bath in good shape, with a thriving economy and much to celebrate.

politicalExperience.achievements: leaving Bath in good shape, with a thriving economy

contactInformation.address:
The Rt Hon Don Foster
31 James Street West
BA1 2BT

endorsements.endorsement: I would like to commend Steve Bradley to you as my successor. I believe he stands head and shoulders above the other candidates. He's intelligent, straightforward, energetic and genuinely wants to make a difference, particularly in terms of transport and environmental crisis. He's been committed to Bath since his student days and shares my passion for our City.

images.caption: Handwritten campaign letter from Don Foster

leaflet.additionalNotes: Steve Bradley is commended by Don Foster, who is stepping down. Don Foster believes Steve Bradley is the right successor and highlights his dedication to making a difference in transport and environmental issues.
